item.description:
Hey Everyone.....

I am a volunteer for the Ellie Fund, which is a group that supports Breast Cancer. We are having an event next month that is going to be a blast so I thought that I would share it with all of you. It is a Comedy, Lingerie Fashion Show & Bachelor Auction.....Yes that is right the women will be modeling lingerie and men will be auctioned off. The tickets are on sale now at http://www.elliefund..... Tickets go for $25 for a regular seat and $35 for VIP. you can get more information about the event at the website. I have already bought my VIP tickets.....I want to be front row for this!!!!! Be sure to buy your tickets now and secure yourself a free goodie bag and a front row seat. Please tell all your friends about this and lets get a great group of girls together who are interested in supporting a good cause while checking out some hot men!!!!!



For more information, see http://www.elliefund....
item.name: Ellie Fund Fall Frolic
